contents.value:
Returns the maximum of one or more int values.

```ballerina
int:max(50, 20, 30, 70, 65) ⇒ 70
[int, int, int] scores = [52, 95, 76];
int:max(...scores) ⇒ 95
int n = 18;
n.max(25, 30, 4, 15) ⇒ 30
```
  
  
---  
  
### Parameters  
  
`int` ***n*** : first int value  
`int[]...` ***ns*** : other int values  
  
---  
  
### Return  
`int` : maximum value of value of parameter `n` and all of parameter `ns`  
  
---  
  
[View API Docs](https://lib.ballerina.io/ballerina/lang.int/0.0.0#max)
